channel.title: Action timers on Prayer Altars?

item.title: Action timers on Prayer Altars?
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

[quote=“Noob.Coder, post:3, topic:240729”]Yes, Rog3r’s correct. MoparScaperDude, your code was messy and not set correctly. You didn’t set your spaces correctly I.E. Case 61:

                                     (YOUR CODE)
  • That is not correct. Check out the Java coding conventions please also. You might learn a few things.[/quote]

Idiot…

item.title: Action timers on Prayer Altars?
item.dc:creator: @Noob.Coder Noob.Coder
item.description:
@Noob.Coder wrote:

Yes, Rog3r’s correct. MoparScaperDude, your code was messy and not set correctly. You didn’t set your spaces correctly I.E. Case 61:

                                     (YOUR CODE)
  • That is not correct. Check out the Java coding conventions please also. You might learn a few things.

Read full topic

item.title: Action timers on Prayer Altars?
item.dc:creator: @Rog3r Rog3r
item.description:
@Rog3r wrote:

case 61: if (actionTimer == 0) { addSkillXP((1500 * playerLevel[5]), 5); setSkillLevel(5, getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]), playerXP[5]); playerLevel[5] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]); refreshSkills(); setAnimation(645); sendMessage("The Gods have rewarded you."); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; actionTimer = 15; } else { sendMessage("Slow down on the clicking sir."); break;

Read full topic

item.title: Action timers on Prayer Altars?
item.dc:creator: @MoparScaperDude MoparScaperDude
item.description:
@MoparScaperDude wrote:

Well, heres my situation:

I am wanting to use an action timer on prayer altars, because I have recently made it a way to train prayer. Here is my case code:

[code] case 61:

            addSkillXP((1500 * playerLevel[5]), 5);
setSkillLevel(5, getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]), playerXP[5]);
playerLevel[5] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]);
refreshSkills();
setAnimation(645);
        if (actionTimer == 0) 	
            actionTimer = 15;
sendMessage("The Gods have rewarded you.");
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

break;[/code]

What am I doing wrong? It doesnt seem to function, people can still spam it.

Read full topic
